channel.title: Just 1 thing that i need help on
channel.description:
Ok i've created a custom potion and when i click on it it wields, not drinks. I have sorted the drinking method i just need help on making it NOT wield.
Tell me what file it is in. I do though think it's in client.java but i may be wrong
Please help me, I will rep you if you help me

item.title: Just 1 thing that i need help on
item.dc:creator: @john5689 john5689
item.description:
@john5689 wrote:

[quote=“pk george1, post:2, topic:341102”]I believe that it is in potions.java if your using delta base.

Hope i helped[/quote]

Sorry it didn’t that’s for making the potion drink but it still hasn’t solved the wield problem. I’l make a vid on it

Read full topic
item.source: Just 1 thing that i need help on
